tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CourseSchedule (
  course_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  schedule_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  instructor_id UUID NOT NULL,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CourseSchedule (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE InstructorAvailability (
    instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instructor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    availability_start TIME NOT NULL,
    availability_end TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CourseInstructor (
    course_id INT,
    instructor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES CourseSchedule(course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (instructor_id) REFERENCES InstructorAvailability(instructor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT REFERENCES Course(course_id),
    instructor_id INT REFERENCES Instructor(instructor_id),
    schedule_date DATE,
    schedule_time TIME
);
